text: Area codes 819, 873 and 468 are telephone area codes in the province of Quebec, Canada. They cover the western and northern parts of Quebec, including the city of Gatineau and the surrounding regions. Area code 819 was created in 1957. It was one of the original area codes for Quebec. It was overlaid with 873 in 2012 and 468 on October 22, 2022. 819
title: Area codes 819, 873, and 468
